p: The minimum inhibitory concentration (MIC) was determined as the lowest concentration of the drug capable of inhibiting 50% and 100% growth of the microorganism, for the tests of the substances SHE, SEE, LEE, LEE (MF), BEE, and BEE (MF) compared to the control also containing only the culture medium and the standardized inoculum [ 25]. The tests were performed in triplicate.
